title: inkaa dhaya raakuNTE
sahitya:
inkA daya rAkuNTE entani sairinturA



caraNam 1



Ashincina nannEla aDugaDuguku rAvela vAsiga sItAlOla varadEshika paripAla



caraNam 2



entani taLukondurA ikanainanu rAkundur  intaTikini bAgandurA evarani

vEDukondurA



caraNam 3



nIrjaravarulika lErA nI sari tanakayyErA durjana jalada sam ra dora nIvani unnArA



caraNam 4



nayana nindita sarOja nagadhara shrI raghurAja bhayahara bhakta samAja pAlita

tyAgarAja
